resources.string: WHAT PRODUCTS ARE AVAILABLE THROUGH THE HOME DELIVERY SERVICE?

We deliver Food from your favorite restaurants, Provision for your daily needs, Cakes, Flowers, Gifts, Medicines, Baby care products, Pet items, Books and a lot more. We also provide any kind of pickup and delivery, repair and delivery, bill payments and laundry service; which means almost anything.
IN WHICH AREAS DO YOU CURRENTLY HAVE THE HOME DELIVERY SERVICE?
We currently operate in Cox town, Frazer town, Cooke town, Benson Town, Jayamahal, Sindhi Colony, MEG Officers Colony and surrounding areas..
WHAT ARE THE DELIVERY TIMINGS FOR YOUR SERVICE?
Our delivery unit is functional between 9 am to 10.45 pm. Some items will be subject to availability and the work timings of our partners..
HOW LONG DO YOU TAKE TO DELIVER?

JoMaange`s delivery system is uniquely designed to provide you the facility to select a convenient time to receive your purchases anytime between 9 am to 10.45 pm. You can use this feature to schedule future deliveries as well. To cater to your immediate needs, we commit to deliver items within an hour depending on the items you order..
CAN I ORDER ONLINE?
you can call us @ 080 6688 8888 , you will be able to order online shortly.
HOW MUCH DOES THE HOME DELIVERY SERVICE COST?

Our service is available at a convenience fee starting as low as Rs.10/Km. The good news is that we have most of the retailers in most areas listed as our partners; hence the orders from them within a set distance will continue to be free!
HOW MUCH IS YOUR MINIMUM ORDER?
We do not have a minimum order policy. We will deliver anything you require irrespective of its cost.
HOW DO I PAY?

You can pay us once you receive your order; currently the option is cash on delivery. In due course we will provide better and convenient modes of payments like Credit cards, Net banking, cheque payments, etc.
WHAT IS INCLUDED ON THE BILLING PAYMENT RECEIPT?
Your billing payment receipt will include an itemized entry of each item that you ordered.
DO YOU EVER SELL MY E-MAIL ADDRESS/PH. NUMBER?

All the information we collect via our website or through correspondence with you is used to operate and improve the service we offer you. We are committed to using your personal information only for: * Dealing with orders and accounts for the supply of our goods and services * Planning and managing JoMaange`s business activities, including analyzing customer`s shopping habits and preferences * Providing you with information about our products and services. * Informing you about the offers from other companies, but only with your permission.
WHAT IS YOUR DELIVERY POLICY?
Our delivery policy is to make life easier and hassle free for our customers without compromising on the price or quality while shopping for anything and everything!!!
CAN I CHOOSE THE PLACE WHERE I WANT MY PRODUCTS FROM?
Yes, we provide you the option to choose the place you want the products from. The convenience fee will vary depending on the delivery distance.
HOW DO I TRUST YOUR AGENTS TO MAKE DELIVERIES TO MY HOUSE?

JoMaange has defined processes and quality checks to avoid such issues. In any case you are requested to check the order upon delivery. In case you find items missing from your order, we will offer to reorder the item. You will only need to pay for items that you have received. Please do call our customer service team to lodge a complaint, your feedback is important. We will check your order, investigate and respond to your complaint with-in 48 hrs.
I AM NOT HAPPY WITH THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCTS THAT I HAVE RECEIVED.

JoMaange provides delivery service and has no direct control on the quality of items or products supplied. We choose our partners by taking into consideration feedback from customers. If you order from a particular restaurant/retail unit of your choice and the product/item do not meet expected standards then you can call our customer service team to report the problem. Jo Maange shall pass on the feedback to the concerned unit. JoMaange will not take liability, obligation or responsibility for any happenings but will only act as a mediator to solve the issue. In case the item/product delivered is not from the unit you specified then we will offer to replace or refund as per the policies of the restaurant / retail unit partner. If you order from any restaurant/retail unit partner of JoMaange and the product/item do not meet the specified quality standards then you can call our customer service team to report the problem. JoMaange would liaise with the retail unit/Restaurant and would solve the issue amicably. If we find that the items/products did not meet the expected quality, then we will offer to replace or refund that item/product as per the policies of the restaurant / retail unit partner..
I HAVE BEEN OVERCHARGED.

JoMaange has defined processes and quality checks to avoid such issues and include an itemized entry of every product that you ordered in your bill. However, in case of any error noticed, kindly call our customer service and we shall have the same corrected for you.
TOO MUCH TIME TAKEN TO DELIVER.

JoMaange follows a standard process of setting the correct time expectations, depending on the kind of products or items ordered. In case the delivery is not done within the committed time period, then kindly call our customer service to lodge a complaint. Your feedback is very valuable and will help us investigate such unwanted instances and resolve the same.
PRODUCT NOT FROM THE STORE I SPECIFIED.

In case the ordered item/product is not available at the store you specified, then we will give you an option to choose another unit or order from one of our partner stores. If the product/item delivered to you is not from the unit you specified then we will offer to replace or refund the same.
